item.title: Steadfast and Immovable
item.description:
Steadfast and Immovable by undefined Mary Ellen W. Smoot, Relief Society General President given in Session 6 of 171st Semiannual General Conference on Sun Sep 30 2001
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: undefined Mary Ellen W. Smoot, Relief Society General President

item.title: Developing Inner Strength
item.description:
